revised_title: Photoelectron Spectra Analysis of Thionyl and Sulphuryl Compounds
tldr: The authors studied the photoelectron spectra of compounds containing thionyl and sulphuryl groups. They measured ionization potentials and analyzed the vibrational patterns in the spectra, providing insights into the molecular orbitals and bonding in these compounds. The study helps to understand the differences between thionyl and sulphuryl compounds and their related chemical properties.
